summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. , for the improvement of 41st Avenue North, 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, each from East Madison Street to McGilvra Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40712 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
